quest.title: Find out what is this place
Complete your first puzzle
quest.description: Manage your knowledge and skills and escape from the puzzle.

quest.title: Win your first fight
quest.description: Now you will have to continue and fight off with several monsters.

quest.title: Survive the bigger puzzle
quest.description: Now you will have to complete a bigger puzzle, now with monsters in between, take care!

quest.title: Escape from the labyrinth
quest.description: Find out where is the exit of the labyrinth. Try not to get caught.

quest.title: Defeat the Nigthmare boss
quest.description: A huge monster rose from darkness... It also brought some of its friends. Kill it!

quest.title: Look into your diary
quest.description: As you wake up, go to the table and look up your tasklist on your diary.

quest.title: Visit the shop
quest.description: Go to your computer in your room and look up on the internet.

quest.title: Save the game
quest.description: You feel admired by the statue in the main lobby. It reminds you of the past...

quest.title: Interact with residents
quest.description: After your nigthmarish sleep, you ask yourself who that people may be.

quest.title: Talk with grandpa
quest.description: When already explored the house and residents, you ask yourself where are you...
